alert.note: Alert for Central Middlesex County; Northern Worcester; Southeast Middlesex; Southern Worcester; Suffolk; Western Norfolk (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 09 at 2:30PM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Worcester, northwestern Norfolk, west central Suffolk and central Middlesex Counties through 330 PM EDT... At 229 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Concord to near Shrewsbury. Movement was south at 10 mph. HAZARD...Pea size hail. SOURCE...Trained Spotter Reported. IMPACT...Little to no impact from hail is expected. Locations impacted include... Boston, Worcester, Cambridge, Newton, Framingham, Waltham, Brookline, Medford, Arlington, Billerica, Marlborough, Woburn, Shrewsbury, Natick, Watertown, Lexington, Needham, Wellesley, Belmont and Burlington. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: Get indoors when you hear thunder. Do not resume outdoor activities until at least 30 minutes after the storm has passed. Do not drive through flooded roads or underpasses. Avoid low lying areas near small streams.

area.areaDesc: Central Middlesex County; Northern Worcester; Southeast Middlesex; Southern Worcester; Suffolk; Western Norfolk
